feed.title: Co-Author for ''Redefinition of the term address"

entry.title: Co-Author for ''Redefinition of the term address"
entry.summary: A request for a co-author has been made for a BIP on Github. The link to the BIP in question is provided, as well as a mention of Marco Falke and his reasons for requesting a co-author. Additionally, there is an attachment included in the message, named pEpkey.asc, which appears to be a PGP key with a size of 3147 bytes.
